dt: {bc}a device that consists of a lightproof chamber with an aperture fitted with a lens and a shutter through which the image of an object is projected onto a surface for recording (as on a photosensitive film or an electronic sensor) or for translation into electrical impulses (as for television broadcast)
{bc}the treasury department of the papal curia
{bc}while not being filmed by a television or movie camera
{bc}outside the scope of a television or movie camera

dt.t: sounds of gunfire taking place {it}off camera{/it}

dt: {bc}while being filmed by a television or movie camera
{bc}within the scope of a television or movie camera

dt.t: you can hear a dog but he never appears {it}on camera{/it}

shortdef: a device that consists of a lightproof chamber with an aperture fitted with a lens and a shutter through which the image of an object is projected onto a surface for recording (as on a photosensitive film or an electronic sensor) or for translation into electrical impulses (as for television broadcast)
the treasury department of the papal curia

dt: {bc}an instrument that by means of a prism or mirrors and often a microscope causes a virtual image of an object to appear as if projected upon a plane surface so that an outline may be traced

shortdef: an instrument that by means of a prism or mirrors and often a microscope causes a virtual image of an object to appear as if projected upon a plane surface so that an outline may be traced

dt: {bc}a darkened enclosure having an aperture usually provided with a lens through which light from external objects enters to form an image of the objects on the opposite surface

shortdef: a darkened enclosure having an aperture usually provided with a lens through which light from external objects enters to form an image of the objects on the opposite surface

dt: {bc}a video camera that is worn on clothing and used to continuously record activity in front of the wearer

dt.t: Americans are deeply divided over race relations and police use of force. One thing they don't seem to be divided over, however, is support for police {wi}body cameras{/wi}.

shortdef: a video camera that is worn on clothing and used to continuously record activity in front of the wearer

dt: {bc}a box-shaped camera with a simple lens and rotary shutter

shortdef: a box-shaped camera with a simple lens and rotary shutter

dt: {bc}a camera used to record subjects in a natural, spontaneous, or unposed manner
{bc}something likened to a camera used in such a manner

shortdef: a camera used to record subjects in a natural, spontaneous, or unposed manner; also : something likened to a camera used in such a manner

dt: {bc}a camera that records images as digital data instead of on film

shortdef: a camera that records images as digital data instead of on film

dt: {bc}a small camera that is designed for use on an exterior door, that includes or connects to a doorbell, and that often has a built-in microphone and speaker {bc}{sx|video doorbell||}

dt.t: Thanks to a rise in package theft, {wi}doorbell cameras{/wi} have gained popularity …
[Marsha] Kazarosian [attorney] tells clients to make sure they shut off the microphone on their {wi}doorbell camera{/wi} …
… began speaking to the deputy through a speaker in the {wi}doorbell camera{/wi}.

shortdef: a small camera that is designed for use on an exterior door, that includes or connects to a doorbell, and that often has a built-in microphone and speaker : video doorbell

dt: {bc}a camera that detects the radiation from a radioactive tracer injected into the body and is used especially in medical diagnostic scanning

shortdef: a camera that detects the radiation from a radioactive tracer injected into the body and is used especially in medical diagnostic scanning

et: New Latin, literally, in a chamber
